name: Dwarfender
description:
Dwarfender is an action-strategy fantasy game taking place in the dwarven caves, take control of a powerful dwarf named Rigolain !
Use your blunderbuss and a set of traps to defeat your stone foes and steal their crystals !

Use these crystals to build more traps and huge towers to make a perfect stronghold !




**Features :**
• 3 unique levels ! Fight waves of enemies !
• 5 kinds of traps including 2 types of towers !
• 3 types of golems to destroy !
• Find out why Rigolain cares so much about crystals !

A game made by students over the course of three months.
